verses.verse: וַֽיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD פָּקַ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> visited אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> Sarah כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he אָמָ֑ר <S%H559><s%> as he had said וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לְשָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> unto Sarah כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> as he had spoken

וַתַּהַר֩ <S%H2029><s%> conceived וַתֵּ֨לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare שָׂרָ֧ה <S%H8283><s%> For Sarah לְאַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham בֵּ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> a son לִזְקֻנָ֑יו <S%H2208><s%> in his old age לַמּוֹעֵ֕ד <S%H4150><s%> at the set time אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had spoken אֹת֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> for אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of which God

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name בְּנ֧וֹ <S%H1121><s%> of his son הַנּֽוֹלַד־ <S%H3205><s%> that was born ל֛וֹ אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom יָלְדָה־ <S%H3205><s%> bare לּ֥וֹ שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> unto him whom Sarah יִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> to him Isaac

וַיָּ֤מָל <S%H4135><s%> circumcised אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁמֹנַ֖ת <S%H8083><s%> being eight יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> had commanded אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> as God

וְאַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old מְאַ֣ת <S%H3967><s%> was an hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years בְּהִוָּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> was born ל֔וֹ אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> when his son

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׂרָ֔ה <S%H8283><s%> And Sarah צְחֹ֕ק <S%H6712><s%> me to laugh עָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> hath made לִ֖י אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone הַשֹּׁמֵ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> [so that] all that hear יִֽצְחַק־ <S%H6711><s%> will laugh לִֽי׃

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who מִלֵּל֙ <S%H4448><s%> Who would have said לְאַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham הֵינִ֥יקָה <S%H3243><s%> suck בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> should have given children שָׂרָ֑ה <S%H8283><s%> that Sarah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָלַ֥דְתִּי <S%H3205><s%> ? for I have born בֵ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> [him] a son לִזְקֻנָֽיו׃ <S%H2208><s%> in his old age

וַיִּגְדַּ֥ל <S%H1431><s%> grew הַיֶּ֖לֶד <S%H3206><s%> And the child וַיִּגָּמַ֑ל <S%H1580><s%> and was weaned וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> and Abraham מִשְׁתֶּ֣ה <S%H4960><s%> feast גָד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> a great בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the [same] day הִגָּמֵ֥ל <S%H1580><s%> was weaned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> that Isaac

וַתֵּ֨רֶא <S%H7200><s%> saw שָׂרָ֜ה <S%H8283><s%> And Sarah אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הָגָ֧ר <S%H1904><s%> of Hagar הַמִּצְרִ֛ית <S%H4713><s%> the Egyptian אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom יָלְדָ֥ה <S%H3205><s%> which she had born לְאַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham מְצַחֵֽק׃ <S%H6711><s%> mocking

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> Wherefore she said לְאַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham גָּרֵ֛שׁ <S%H1644><s%> Cast out הָאָמָ֥ה <S%H519><s%> this bondwoman הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנָ֑הּ <S%H1121><s%> and her son כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יִירַשׁ֙ <S%H3423><s%> shall not be heir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> for the son הָאָמָ֣ה <S%H519><s%> of this bondwoman הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בְּנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> with my son עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> [even] with Isaac

וַיֵּ֧רַע <S%H7489><s%> distressed הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> And the thing מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> was very בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> sight אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> in Abraham's עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and אוֹדֹ֥ת <S%H182><s%> because בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> of his son

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָהָ֗ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not יֵרַ֤ע <S%H7489><s%> be distressed בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because הַנַּ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> because of the lad וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because אֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H519><s%> and because of thy bondwoman כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after תֹּאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> hath said אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> about שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> in all that Sarah שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> unto thee hearken בְּקֹלָ֑הּ <S%H6963><s%> unto her voice כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בְיִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> for in Isaac יִקָּרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> be called לְךָ֖ זָֽרַע׃ <S%H2233><s%> shall thy seed

וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> And also of the son הָאָמָ֖ה <S%H519><s%> of the bondwoman לְג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> a nation אֲשִׂימֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7760><s%> will I make כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because זַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> because he [is] thy seed הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֣ם <S%H7925><s%> rose up early אַבְרָהָ֣ם ׀ <S%H85><s%> And Abraham בַּבֹּ֡קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> and took לֶחֶם֩ <S%H3899><s%> bread וְחֵ֨מַת <S%H2573><s%> and a bottle מַ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֠גָר <S%H1904><s%> [it] unto Hagar שָׂ֧ם <S%H7760><s%> putting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שִׁכְמָ֛הּ <S%H7926><s%> [it] on her shoulder וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֶּ֖לֶד <S%H3206><s%> and the child וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֶ֑הָ <S%H7971><s%> and sent her away וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> departed וַתֵּ֔תַע <S%H8582><s%> and wandered בְּמִדְבַּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness בְּאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <S%H884><s%> of Beersheba

וַיִּכְל֥וּ <S%H3615><s%> was spent הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> And the water מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> in הַחֵ֑מֶת <S%H2573><s%> the bottle וַתַּשְׁלֵ֣ךְ <S%H7993><s%> and she cast אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֶּ֔לֶד <S%H3206><s%> the child תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under אַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> under one הַשִּׂיחִֽם׃ <S%H7880><s%> of the shrubs

וַתֵּלֶךְ֩ <S%H1980><s%> went וַתֵּ֨שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and sat her down לָ֜הּ מִנֶּ֗גֶד <S%H5048><s%> over against הַרְחֵק֙ <S%H7368><s%> [him] a good way off כִּמְטַחֲוֵ֣י <S%H2909><s%> shot קֶ֔שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> arch כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָֽמְרָ֔ה <S%H559><s%> for she said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not אֶרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> Let me not see בְּמ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> the death הַיָּ֑לֶד <S%H3206><s%> of the child וַתֵּ֣שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> And she sat מִנֶּ֔גֶד <S%H5048><s%> him וַתִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> over against [him] and lift up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֹלָ֖הּ <S%H6963><s%> her voice וַתֵּֽבְךְּ׃ <S%H1058><s%> and wept

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard אֱלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice הַנַּעַר֒ <S%H5288><s%> of the lad וַיִּקְרָא֩ <S%H7121><s%> called מַלְאַ֨ךְ <S%H4397><s%> and the angel אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָגָר֙ <S%H1904><s%> to Hagar מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> out of heaven וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לָ֖הּ מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> to her What לָּ֣ךְ הָגָ֑ר <S%H1904><s%> to Hagar אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <S%H3372><s%> affright כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֧ע <S%H8085><s%> hath heard אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> not for God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> of the lad בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

ק֚וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> Arise שְׂאִ֣י <S%H5375><s%> lift up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> the lad וְהַחֲזִ֥יקִי <S%H2388><s%> and hold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדֵ֖ךְ <S%H3027><s%> him in thine hand בּ֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> him a great אֲשִׂימֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H7760><s%> for I will make

וַיִּפְקַ֤ח <S%H6491><s%> opened אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינֶ֔יהָ <S%H5869><s%> her eyes וַתֵּ֖רֶא <S%H7200><s%> and she saw בְּאֵ֣ר <S%H875><s%> a well מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וַתֵּ֜לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַתְּמַלֵּ֤א <S%H4390><s%> and filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֙מֶת֙ <S%H2573><s%> the bottle מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> with water וַתַּ֖שְׁקְ <S%H8248><s%> drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנָּֽעַר׃ <S%H5288><s%> the lad

וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> and became אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> was with הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> was with the lad וַיִּגְדָּ֑ל <S%H1431><s%> and he grew וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> and became רֹבֶ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> abundance קַשָּֽׁת׃ <S%H7199><s%> archer

וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> And he dwelt בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness פָּארָ֑ן <S%H6290><s%> of Paran וַתִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> took ל֥וֹ אִמּ֛וֹ <S%H517><s%> and his mother אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> him a wife מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> And it came to pass at that time הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake אֲבִימֶ֗לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> that Abimelech וּפִיכֹל֙ <S%H6369><s%> and Phichol שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the chief captain צְבָא֔וֹ <S%H6635><s%> of his host אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> God עִמְּךָ֔ <S%H5973><s%> in בְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> [is] with thee in all that thou doest

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now הִשָּׁ֨בְעָה <S%H7650><s%> Now therefore swear לִּ֤י בֵֽאלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> by God הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> unto me here אִם־ <S%H518><s%> you will not תִּשְׁקֹ֣ר <S%H8266><s%> that thou wilt not deal falsely לִ֔י וּלְנִינִ֖י <S%H5209><s%> with me nor with my son וּלְנֶכְדִּ֑י <S%H5220><s%> nor with my son's son כַּחֶ֜סֶד <S%H2617><s%> [but] according to the kindness אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֤יתִי <S%H6213><s%> that I have done עִמְּךָ֙ <S%H5973><s%> you תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> unto thee thou shalt do עִמָּדִ֔י <S%H5978><s%> against וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> and to הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto me and to the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which גַּ֥רְתָּה <S%H1481><s%> wherein thou hast sojourned בָּֽהּ׃
וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I אִשָּׁבֵֽעַ׃ <S%H7650><s%> I will swear

וְהוֹכִ֥חַ <S%H3198><s%> reproved אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> Abimelech עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֹדוֹת֙ <S%H182><s%> because בְּאֵ֣ר <S%H875><s%> of a well הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which גָּזְל֖וּ <S%H1497><s%> had violently taken away עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> servants אֲבִימֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H40><s%> which Abimelech's

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> And Abimelech לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> neither יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I wot מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> not who hath done אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again אַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> me לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> me neither הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <S%H5046><s%> didst thou tell לִּ֗י וְגַ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> again אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> yet heard בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> I [of it] but הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> to day

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> took אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> And Abraham צֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep וּבָקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> and oxen וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave לַאֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> them unto Abimelech וַיִּכְרְת֥וּ <S%H3772><s%> made שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> and both of them בְּרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> a covenant

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲבִימֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> And Abimelech אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What הֵ֗נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in שֶׁ֤בַע <S%H7651><s%> [mean] these seven כְּבָשֹׂת֙ <S%H3535><s%> ewe lambs הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הִצַּ֖בְתָּ <S%H5324><s%> which thou hast set לְבַדָּֽנָה׃ <S%H905><s%> alone

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> For [these] seven כְּבָשֹׂ֔ת <S%H3535><s%> ewe lambs תִּקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> shalt thou take מִיָּדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> of my hand בַּעֲבוּר֙ <S%H5668><s%> that תִּֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִּ֣י לְעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5713><s%> they may be a witness כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חָפַ֖רְתִּי <S%H2658><s%> unto me that I have digged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּאֵ֥ר <S%H875><s%> this well הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that קָרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> Wherefore he called לַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> that place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> Beersheba כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> because שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there נִשְׁבְּע֖וּ <S%H7650><s%> because there they sware שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> both of them

וַיִּכְרְת֥וּ <S%H3772><s%> Thus they made בְרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant בִּבְאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> at Beersheba וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up אֲבִימֶ֗לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> then Abimelech וּפִיכֹל֙ <S%H6369><s%> and Phichol שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the chief captain צְבָא֔וֹ <S%H6635><s%> of his host וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> and they returned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines
